title: Aerospace Structural Mechanics I
description: Aircraft and spacecraft flight loads and operational envelopes, three-dimensional stress/strain relations, metallic and composite materials, failure theories, three-dimensional space trusses and stiffened shear panels, combined extension-bend-twist behavior of thin-walled multicell aircraft and space vehicle structures, modulus-weighted section properties, shear center. Prerequisites: SE 105 (or MAE 21) and SE 101B (or MAE 30B) and SE 110A (or MAE 131A).
